forum.name: bugs and glitches

forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: two things that dont merge as expected

comments.text: for this one i dont havy any idea why, its just three colours
and for this door it seems to be related to the metal studs, after i changed them to the new pill shape it merged down to 6 parts, still more than three colours tho
here is another one that doesnt merge, i think the two archy bits are doing it because if i take them off its just one part even tho the pillar is two
ive noted that at least these three shapes dont merge after resizing, the bottom three merge into one but the top three are one each
